original_text: Then the people rejoiced because they had given willingly, for with a whole heart they had offered freely to the Lord. David the king also rejoiced greatly.
korean_text: 백성들은 자원하여 드렸으므로 기뻐하였으니 곧 그들이 성심으로 여호와께 자원하여 드렸으므로 다윗 왕도 심히 기뻐하니라

sentences.original_text: for with a whole heart they had offered freely to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 온전한 마음으로 주께 자유롭게 드렸기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: David the king also rejoiced greatly
